name: The Seven Card Game
description:
Short description: It is like a simplified version of the sevens card game. Just for fun, it looks like a hand-held electronic game.

Keyboard shortcut keys are also available:

  • Left (Move cursor left) :  Left Arrow
  • Right(Move cursor right): Right Arrow
  • Play (Put the card on the table) : Up Arrow/ Spacebar / Enter
  • Pass (Skip your turn) : Down Arrow/ Escape
  • Restart (Reset the game) : Backspace
